Package com.jasoncarloscox.familymapserver.data.access

Class EventAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jasoncarloscox.familymapserver.data.access.Access
      • com.jasoncarloscox.familymapserver.data.access.EventAccess
  • public class EventAccess
extends Access
    Contains methods for accessing event data in the database.

      Creates a new EventAccess object.

      Removes all events associated with a given user.

      Creates a new table to hold events if it doesn't already exist in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add​(Event event)
         throws DBException
        Adds a new event to the database.
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be added to the database
        Throws:
        DBException - if a field is missing or invalid, if the database is not open, or if another database error occurs

      • get

        public Event get​(java.lang.String eventId)
          throws DBException
        Gets a event from the database.
        Parameters:
        eventId - the id of the event to be found
        Returns:
        an object containing the event's data, or null if no event was found with the given id
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database is not open, or if another database error occurs

      • getAll

        public java.util.Collection<Event> getAll​(java.lang.String username)
                                   throws DBException
        Gets all events associated with a specific user from the database.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user whose events should be retrieved
        Returns:
        objects containing the events' data
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database is not open, or if another database error occurs

      • clear

        public void clear()
           throws DBException
        Removes all events from the database.
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database is not open, or if another database error occurs

      • clearAll

        public void clearAll​(java.lang.String username)
              throws DBException
        Removes all events associated with a given user.
        Parameters:
        username - the user's username
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database is not open, or if another database error occurs

      • createTableIfMissing

        protected void createTableIfMissing()
                             throws DBException
        Creates a new table to hold events if it doesn't already exist in the database.
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database is not open, or if another database error occurs
